name: 4th Street Grille
review description: I had been to this restaurant twice before with a group of 4, 2, and lastly 12. The first two visits were more positive experiences. The service was fine but the food was just average for me. Let's just say that not one of the 12 people that ate there gave me any feedback whatsoever. I ordered the fish and chips and regretted it right after I saw it. The fish looked like a fast food fry and was absolutely tasteless. Fries were just average, nothing special. I did not finish the meal as it was too bland. My co-worker ordered a very nice spinach salad but his black bean soup was delvered cold. it took the waiter about 10-15 minutes to come back to the table to even notice it. My co-worker had time to complete this whole salad.

name: Aioli Bodega Espanola
review description: We had the best evening in July to enjoy the outdoor patio. It was beautiful. The only thing that was of a concern is that the sun was in everyone's eyes. I thought they should have foreseen this issue before the dinner instead of spending time during dinner trying to correct the problem. The food was excellent and the patio had a fabulous ambiance. We were a table of 10 and had a wonderful evening.

name: Alebrijes Mexican Bistro
review description: The food was great. I had the pork tenderloin with bourbon sauce. Very delicious and meat was so tender. The one thing that made our experience very uncomfortable was the fact that they have no air-conditioner. We won't be going back in the summer. Too hot in the restaurant to eat.

name: Ambience
review description: This was my third time back. The food was outstanding as usual. We did the 7 course option this time. It was fantastic! We had venison, beef wellington (deconstructed), a perfectly cooked cod, and a lovely Baked Alaska. The sauces were perfect for each dish, and each piece of protein was cooked to perfection. The portions were just right and we left comfortably full but not stuffed. This meal compares favorably to the meals we had in Paris in May, and that's really saying something!

name: Back Wine Bar & Bistro
review description: I have had dinner at the Back Wine Bar & Bistro about 5 times now over the last 2 yrs. The food has always been outstanding, I have never been let down.

name: Bamiyan - Citrus Heights
review description: This was my second visit to Sacramento Ca Benihana. I've been to many other Benihana including their branch in Ginza Tokyo many times. I ordered same order as I did this time, Hibachi Chateaubriand. Meat they served me was far from Chateaubriand this time. Restaurant know meat was not Chateaubriand and Chef should also know. I realized one of Chateaubriand we order, which came to me wasn't proper Chateaubriand cut and has too much fat portion in it. I tried to eat but it wasn't what I expected and told Chef to call manager and told him that this is not Chateaubriand. It was a big disappointment for me that Benihana serves this kind of food to customers and it was the worst experience.

name: Bamiyan - El Dorado Hills
address: 1121 White Rock Rd El Dorado Hills, CA  95762
review description: We went on a Monday night so it was very quiet. Very nice decor...outstanding service and excellent food.

name: Benihana - Sacramento
review description: Excellent Food and Excellent Service after we were seated. The hostess was not very friendly and did not seat us according to our reservation time. We will definitely return for the wonderful dinning experience.

name: Biba Restaurant
review description: My wife and I celebrated our 17th wedding anniversary at Biba and we both felt it was a memorable moment. The food was excellant (my wife had the lasaga and I had the marinated grilled chicken) and prepared to perfection; our waitress was most congenial and shared some humorous conversation with us; and the atmosphere was both lively and pleasant (we love the combination of old/new world decor). All and all it was another pleasurable eating experience at Biba.

name: Bidwell Street Bistro
review description: Friday night was really busy. Since we didn't make our decision on wine right away it, it took waiter quite some time to get back to us. Another table that came in after us brought their own wine so waiter spent lots of time opening theirs before he came back for our order. So be decisive or bring in your own wine. Gespacho and Salmon were best ever!!!! Of course it IS salmon season.

name: Bistro 234
review description: We always enjoy The Bistro, their specials and can hardly wait to go back.

name: Bistro 33
review description: Need to change the menu. We eat here often and getting tired of it...but that said, it is still a good place to eat. Staff is always nice.

name: Black Angus Steakhouse - Bakersfield
review description: Always a pleasure dining at Black Angus-Bakersfield, CA.

name: Black Angus Steakhouse - Citrus Heights
review description: One of the better experiences I have had eating out.

name: Black Angus Steakhouse - Fresno
review description: Very small portions of food.

name: Blackbird Kitchen and Bar
review description: Most unusual and excellent dining experience. Seafood chowder is outstanding, Sopped up every last drop with bread. Scallops very good. Pork belly with peaches and prawns very different and very good. Cheesecake was delicious and beautiful presentation. Our waiter was most informative about the wine, where to buy, cooking information, suggestions. Overall a wonderful experience, a little loud even dining early. Good stop before Cosmo cabaret.

name: Blue Prynt
review description: The food was average. Nothing special. The restaurant was understaffed the night we had dinner, so service was slow. But the staff were really trying to pull it together and they did the best they could. They remained friendly and were working as fast as possible to service the customers (they had a big party in the back room, plus the diners in the front). The bartender was really great - tending bar, waiting tables, checking people out, etc. There is no ambiance in the restaurant. Very "cold" feeling. So, they need better food and more decorations, as the staff could really pull off a great restaurant if they had something great to serve.

name: Boulevard Bistro
address: 8941 Elk Grove Boulevard Elk Grove, CA  95624
review description: This is a fantastic restaurant. The food is great from the quality to the taste. The service is friendly and prices are reasonable for what's offered. We never feel rushed while dining. Although the location is not the greatest, once inside the food and beverages will transport you to a whole other place. This is a local favorite! We can wait to go back to try brunch, we hear it's amazing.

name: The Broiler Steakhouse
review description: Great porterhouse for two, and the filet is superb.

name: Buca di Beppo - Roseville
review description: Better than average food and service

name: Buca di Beppo - Sacramento
review description: Met my brother and wife there... hadn't seen them in a year. Food was very good, I was surprised at the pricing (a good surprise). The attentiveness of the staff was amazing. We'll definetly be back.

name: Buckhorn Steakhouse
review description: Winters is a lovely little town, restaurant in an old bldg. with interesting decor. Menu prices very high for the quality of food served. A sirloin steak is a sirloin steak, tough and chewy, not worth $37.00. Served with a baked potato,veggies and a salad all about the same quality as Denny's. Nothing special. They didnot serve us the bread that came with the dinner and had to ask two people for butter for the potato. The service was about you would expect on a busy night but nice waiter and he did the best he could.

name: Buonarroti Ristorante - Lincoln
review description: The food and wine we had were very good. Although they had just run out of the special, so that was a disappointment. The server we had was friendly, but not very attentive. We ended what was an excellent meal, waiting having to have the server found just to get our bill.

name: C.R. Gibbs American Grille
review description: What a wonderful find for lunch! Right off the freeway! Tri tip sandwich was great. French onion soup probably one of the best I've ever eaten. And the hostess and waitstaff were great. Thank you!

name: Cafe 225
review description: Great food, great service. The server was prompt and polite. The food was great and the desert fabulous. I wouldn't change a thing.

name: Cafe Mahjaic - Lotus Inn
review description: What a find! In the middle of nowhere...this is a must stop if you are in the area. Food was excellent as was the service. Ambience is like being out in the French countryside.

name: Cafeteria 15L
review description: Their trio of friends is excellent as is their chicken and waffles!

name: Campagnia
review description: During the brunch on the patio I felt the music was too loud--I feel it would have been better if it were turned down a bit allowing for conversation at the table (and as I looked around most table groups were attempting to have discussions.) Thanks--the food and was great and the service very good!

name: Capitol Garage
review description: Super delicious, less busy earlier in theWeekend day

name: Carpe Vino (21+ Establishment)
review description: The food was amazing as usual. Heirloom tomato salad was like no other. We had a large party and shared many different dishes. All of which were unique and scrumptious .

name: Cellar Door
review description: While this is "fine dining" in a small town with limited options, it is not the best place in the area. The service was slow, and the food was good but not at a good value considering the portion size and cost. This is a place you go to if you do not care about the cost and you want a good glass of wine with your meal. There is an extensive wine list.

name: The Chef's Table (Rocklin)
review description: The food was fantastic and the service was amazing!

name: Chops
review description: I got the dinner for two porterhouse steak. It was a really good value and prepared very well. The food was generally good. The potatoes were nothing really special but they werent bad. The crab cakes seemed heavy on the mayo but were fried nicely. I was a little dissapointed with the wine list. It was quite limited.

name: Christian Michael's Ristorante
review description: My husband and I had such a wonderful dining experience. Never had been here before but we will be back often! The foods was amazing and our server was so nice and accommodating. Thoroughly enjoyed our meal. :)

name: Cordova Restaurant & Casino
address: 2801 Prospect Park Drive Rancho Cordova, CA  95670
review description: There have been a few changes since we were here last. In the dinning room one can't get happy hour prices on wine which I thought was not a nice way to treat dinner guests. There were so other specials that were only available at the bar. It gives less of an incentive to meet here now with a group. We still like the all day breakfast and lunch menu options although you can't beat the filet mignon for taste and value. But no more $10 glasses of wine for us!

name: Crush - Chico
review description: Wait staff was outstanding...... rate them 10 of 10

name: Crush 29
review description: I had not been to Crush 29 in a couple of years. I received a gift certificate and was not looking forward to going to Crush because I had found it too noisy in the past and the food & service so-so. I have to say I was pleasantly surprised and plan on returning. I usually go across the street but now I have two places to go for food spirits. The service was excellent and the food was spot on. They were accomodating with my special requests for my food selection.

name: Daily Grill - Fresno
review description: Great server named Moses! Food was delicious with a great atmosphere. Overall great customer service with fine dining!

name: Dawson's - Hyatt Regency Sacramento
review description: This is definitely an intimate place for any special occasion.

name: de Vere's Irish Pub - Davis
review description: The atmosphere is to die for and the food is hearty and comforting. Staff is outstanding. Friendly and professional

name: de Vere's Irish Pub - Sacramento
review description: This was a fun and convenient pre-show destination before an evening at the Sacramento Community Center. Larger inside than it looks. The interesting layout creates an intimate "small pub" feel in a space large enough to accommodate after work or pre-show crowds.

name: Delta King - Pilothouse Restaurant
review description: Made a 7:30 reservation for a Friday evening. Requested a "river view table for quiet conversation". We were seated upon arrival, overlooking the Sacramento River. See-through shading made it possible to avoid being blinded by the setting sun, while enjoying the view. Staff lifted the shades as soon as the sun dipped below window level. Very enjoyable evening at a reasonable cost. Staff was attentive and helpful, without being intrusive.

name: Dewz
review description: This is an up-scale but family-run restaurant that's tucked into a quiet spot on a busy street. Nice atmosphere and soothing music. We went for a birthday lunch but it's obviously a spot for a business lunch-meeting. However, the family staff were friendly and welcoming to us older folk -- even made a helpful suggestion for our next visit.

name: Ella Dining Room and Bar
review description: everything was good but the restaurant was freezing.

name: Enotria Restaurant
review description: We went for a birthday party on Friday evening and we had SUCH a romantic and special time. Our server was the best BEST BEST. I can't wait to go back. Everything was wonderful!!!

name: Esquire Grill
review description: Even though the restaurant only had a few tables occupied, it took 30 minutes for us to get our food.

name: Firebird Russian Restaurant
review description: How do you try to capture the experience when a waiter gets three dishes wrong in one meal for two people on a slow night? My "tender lamb", the most expensive dish on the menu, ended up being 3 skewers of tough, gyro-like re-formed meat that smelled like dog food. Our side order of healthy steamed spinach ended up as a fatty spinach crepe. My wife's beet salad "hold all horseradish" (which she said twice) ended up as a pre-formed cake of sorts of horseradish and a few beets. A truly odd, mystifying dining experience that we laugh at...

name: The Firehouse Restaurant
review description: It was a good dining experience for my wife and I on our anniversary.

name: Five Restaurant
address: 1110 E. Champlain Ave, Suite 101 Fresno, CA  93720
review description: We were there on Sunday at 5:30 pm.I had read some poor reviews elsewhere,but decided to take a chance.Our waiter seemed a bit inexperienced.We were not offered a prix fixe option that I overheard later given to another table.I had lobster ravioi and my husband had the salmon.Both meals were excellent.We've been living in Fresno for about a year and finding really fine food has been hit and miss.Hopefully,the quality of food we had on Sunday will be the usual and not just a fluke.

name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - Fresno
review description: The service was outstanding! Probably the BEST service I have ever had. The food was really good, but SO high priced! For me, that put a downer on the whole experience, even though we went there because I had gift cards that I'd received for my birthday. I personally would rather go to somewhere less expensive. I guess I'm not a real "foodie" and just can't see spending that much money on a dinner. And to top it off, the noise level was UNREAL! We couldn't hear each other talk. As we were leaving, we walked through the bar area. It was so much quieter in the bar on a Saturday evening than in the restaurant!

name: Formaggio Taverna & Patio - Sacramento Marriott Rancho Cordova
address: 11211 Point East Drive Rancho Cordova, CA  95742
review description: We sat outside which was a mistake. The adjacent freeway noise was overwhelming. The wait staff was uniformed and abrupt. The food was mediocre at best. I recently built a wood fired pizza oven in my backyard. I don't yet know what I am doing but my pizzas are much better than the one I had at the Fromaggio. They must be used to serving captives at the hotel. They certainly won't attract non-guests. The only good thing I have to say is that the wine list was affordable.

name: Frank Fat's
review description: We really enjoyed our first experience at Frank Fat's. The food was very good, nice atmosphere and excellent service. We will definitely return and have alreay told others of our experience at Fat's.

name: Galletto Ristorante
review description: Excellent food as always. Doting servers :) live & loud band for private banquet was a surprise, but enjoyed it.

name: Girasole Pizza
address: 2700 E. Bidwell Street Suite 500 Folsom, CA  95630
review description: It took us 2 hours and 10 minutes to order and eat one pizza. The business seems like they opened too early with little to no training. The pizza was ok but nothing special. We drive to eat pizza all over northern california and between pizza quality, service and length of time for the pizza to be made, they are going to have a challenge.

name: Grange
review description: It just keeps delivering week and week. I think I have been there 4 Fridays this summer espcially with their promotion of 50% off wines by the bottle.The locally grown produce is magically transformed to delight the most discerning diner and the entrees present a solid selection of meats, fish , poultry.And I really appreciate them allowing one to order from the bar bistro menu for those times when an entree is too much.I sat there watching the "mixed" milieu outside and thought this place reminds me of being in NYC.

name: Hawks
address: 5530 Douglas Blvd Suite #110 Granite Bay, CA  95746
review description: 1st Time visit. Food was excellent with good recommendations from our waiter. We'll be back.

name: Henry's - Red Hawk Casino
review description: Very good service. The host and our waiter was very attentive and accommodating.Started with dozen of oysters and lobster bisque-Excellent!Main course was the Thai seared halibut-Amazing!!!!My husband main course was t-bone steak-Excellent!

name: High Steaks - Thunder Valley Casino Resort
review description: Had a 6:30p reservation before a 8p show at the casino resort. We weren't seated until 7:15p and then the waiter didn't come until 7:30p. When we checked in, we let them know we had concert tickets. They seemed unconcerned. We were not able to eat. Would not recommend dining here before a show -- eat somwhere not at the casino resort!

name: Il Fornaio - Roseville
review description: This is my 2nd visit to Roseville. The service was not great. I had to wait a while before someone came to my table. The waitress was helpful in that the wine she suggested was great for me but it took forever to get it. When my guest arrived, we ordered a bottle. She brought an opened one and said that I would get more if I took that one! My guest loved her cannaloni but my scallopine was tough, overcooked & cold. It took a while to get her attention to change it and they just cooked it more! She got the manager who really made an effort to satisfy me by asking for another chance to cook a new one. It was much better & he did take it off my check. It was 1+ hrs to eat. Ordered dessert sampler, good except apple crepe-dry and pasty.

name: Il Fornaio - Sacramento
review description: Perfect evening. Our server was the perfect combination of respectful and attentive. The food was excellent in taste, presentation and value. The wine list was impressive and their notable selections for the evening were incredible. A wonderfully paced, relaxed and yummy dinner. A great evening out.

name: India House
review description: We returned after last week because we wanted to try the lunch buffet. Great value for $9.99. One of our favorite restaurants.

name: The Kitchen Restaurant
review description: Wow. I have been to many fine dining establishments and consider myself quite a foodie. I can safely say this is the best dinner experience I have ever had. The best not-kept secret in Sacramento. I will return as soon as my pocketbook allows me to do so.

name: Kupros Bistro
review description: First off, Kupros is in a beautiful old Craftsman house. Very nice. Our waiter was friendly and attentive. We both ordered the Seared Calamari Salad with green beans, kalamata olives, red onion, fingerling potatoes and a poached egg on top. Excellent. Wine was La Creme Chardonnay. Kupros is quite interesting menu with many tempting choices like their Chioggia Beets Salad and White Truffle Mac & Cheese. From Burgers to Niman Ranch Steak au Poivre, everyone will be happy here, which is why we'll return. As to noise-the dining room is upstairs and pretty quiet. Also, it's not hot-has overhead fans and west shade from outside trees. Outdoor dining on upper balcony. Bar area is downstairs. We recommend Kupros!! Oh, they're open Fri/Sat till 2!

name: La Boheme (Fair Oaks)
address: 9634 Fair Oaks Boulevard Fair Oaks, CA  95628
review description: This had to the worst food I have ever had in my entire life. Very expensive for what tasted at best like food that was old and re-heated. They will most likely be shut down by the end of the year. The waiter was very nice...unfortunately, that is the only positive comment I can make at this time. I go out to resturants (nice resturants) almost daily. I do not mind spending money for a nice meal. My date and walk away trying to remember the last time we had such a bad meal...our conversation continued for the next day and obviously we concluded we would never go back.

name: La Provence
review description: La Provence is our first choice restaurant for lunch on the patio or a romantic evening dinner. The atmosphere is lovely. The views are beautiful and tranquil. The food is excellent. Plus, many of the classic French dishes are priced under $15 even at dinner.We discovered this week that it's a great place to bring the whole family. Two kids, two teenagers and two parents with live music in the dining room. Everyone had fun enjoying the music and food.

name: Land Ocean New American Grill
review description: Typically cold in the restaurant, and I bring a sweater. This time it was awfully warm. We even asked the waiter to turn up the air conditioning, but not sure that happened.

name: Le Bistro
address: 3121 West Benjamin Holt Drive Stockton, CA  95219
review description: Dessert is still AMAZING. But the food was fair at best. We were disappointed.

name: Lone Wolf Restaurant and Lounge
address: 12222 New York Ranch Rd Jackson, CA  95642
review description: The food at the Lone Wolf was excellent. A couple of problems that we had was that the waitress did not advise of the size portion of one of our appetizers. It could very easily feed four persons. Also, when we asked for boxes to take the excess home she just brought out the boxes and set them on the table leaving us, the diners, to box them up. The four of us that dined together were dressed "business casual", unfortunately few of the other patrons were. Most were wearing shorts and t-shirts, tank tops or the like. A dress code should be recommended. Even the wait staff were wearing Levi style pants.

name: Malabar American Cooking
review description: The food was excellent & the service very attentive. The only downside was it's rather noisy. However, we have gone to Malabar many times & certainly will go again. We do prefer late lunches as it's much more quiet then. We do recommend as a wonderful place to have delicious and very reasonably priced food. The apple peanut slaw is not to be missed!!

name: Mamma Susanna's - Sacramento
review description: Love this place. Food is consistently great and service is fantastic. Haven't had anything I didn't like and always have a difficult time deciding on which thing to order. Don't let the fact that it is located in a little strip mall make you think that it can't serve up authentic Italian food. It REALLY is great. Plus, they have always been super accommodating to large groups and you can't beat walking out the door with a Dum Dum. :)

name: Maria's Cantina
review description: Food was good, but our server took way too long checking on our table. We had to wait quite a while to even see a bill after dinner. We were not even asked if we wanted dessert.

name: Mauricio's Grill & Cantina - Rosedale
review description: Ultimately this review is tempered by the fact that this is Bakersfield where there are a total of two restaurants on OpenTable, despite a population of 347,000 which is almost half of that of San Francisco. So our expectations were low. However, the specialty margaritas (not the regular ones) were quite good, salsa was also very good, and the service was friendly. Fish tacos, shrimp tacos, and a seafood fajita platter were good enough that if we were in Bakersfield again, we would probably return.

name: Max's Bistro & Bar
review description: I was looking for a nice restaurant for a business meeting in Fresno for four of us with no idea where to go as it's been a long time since I spent much time here. After a short internet reseach, came across this place and thought it fit the bill. Max's totally fit the bill. Though tucked away in a small shopping center, this place was very nice inside. We were promptly seated and then from start to finish the food and service was great. Highly recommend.

name: McCormick & Schmick's Seafood - Roseville - The Fountains
review description: Once again, McCormick and Schmick's is second to none. Thomas was our waiter again and gave us excellent service again. Steve and Mina are also our favorites. Food was perfect.

name: McCormick & Schmick's Seafood - Sacramento
review description: We frequent McCormick's for their San Francisco ambience and their delicious fresh fish menu.

name: Monkey Cat
review description: great meal of chicken florentine, mashed potatos, and greenbeans, all very savory and well prepared. excellent attention from the servers.red wine was served at about 75-80 degrees however, and when i complained, the server couldn't replace it with a chilled one. instead she poured my drink into a chilled glass. better, but why not use their basement to keep wine at celler temp???? am i the 1st to notice the warm wine?

name: Morgan's Restaurant - Sheraton Grand Sacramento
review description: Upscale dining in large, open restaurant within Sheraton in downtown Sacramento. Menu with choices for all palates, wine list to complement. Food well prepared, nice portion size, very tasty. Great service, attentive and accommodating, interested in your having an enjoyable dining experience, mission accomplished. Validated parking a plus.

name: Morton's The Steakhouse - Sacramento
review description: Excellent steak as always; glad to see the mac and cheese back on the menu. Miss the special authentic NY cheesecake. We were celebrating a birthday so having a personalized birthday greeting printed on our menus was a very nice touch!

name: Mulvaney's B&L
review description: Our server, Fianna, was fantastic! I am so glad she recommended the heirloom tomato caprese salad with fresh mozzarella - it was amazing! The pappardelle with wild mushrooms was equally good.

name: The Mustard Seed
review description: Just fantastic. By far my favorite place in Davis. Excellent food, wonderful service, and a cozy atmosphere. Not sure what else I could ask for!

name: Osteria Fasulo
review description: One of the best places I have been to lately. John the wait or was extremely helpful and cordial letting us know about the history if the restaurant. Food was awesome. The outdoor seating was large and roomy and the sounds from the fountains reminded me of Italy. I would highly recommend this restaurant to anyone who wants an incredible dining experience.

name: Papapavlo's Bistro & Bar
review description: Food was great and served in large quantities! Quick service as well.

name: Paul Martin's American Bistro
review description: Enjoyed a friday evening out with our friends. Service and food was outstanding as it has been on our last three visits before this one. Cedar Plank Salmon is always incredible and the Heirloom Tomatoe & Burrata salad was fabulous.

name: Piatti - Sacramento
review description: Good food and service only dissappointment was that two items on menu were not available early in the evening.

name: Pietro's Italian Restaurant
review description: We loved our experience at Pietro's and will return!

name: Pismo's Coastal Grill
review description: This place was fun. Beachy atmosphere, wood floors like decks/piers, lively conversations around us. I loved the beachy decor on the walls. The food was delicious. The grilled shark tasted fresh. I want to go back and try more of their fish selection. My husband was able to get a rare ribeye, even though our server cautioned it may not happen due to their style of preparation on the meat. Our server recommended the champagne viniagrette on my salad and he was right! Very good. I accepted the suggestion of bread for the table (because I love bread) but didn't realize until it came that it was prepared garlic bread. Would have liked plain, warm, crusty bread. I do look forward to going back.

name: Plan B Restaurant
review description: We enjoyed a dinner chosen from a focused and well-varied menu. The cheese stuffed squash blossoms were light and delicious; we knew then we were off to a good start. The prawns were also good; the smashed potatoes silky. My duck breast was a litle overdone for my taste but then I like duck barely cooked. The duck was tender and flavorful.

name: Pocket Bistro
review description: Excellen food and service! They were also very accommodating to menu changes. A pleasureable experience and I will return.

name: The Porch Restaurant & Bar - Sacramento
review description: Date night was very good at the Porch. The food was good, the atmosphere was good and the service was good. All around it was a good time and we will surely go back. My wife liked the fact that they do a different menu every day and it has today's date on it as well. Very nice touch.

name: Putters Bistro
review description: Local restaurant, we eat here often, not because its convenient, because the food is good. Nice golf course view. Food was very good, service was also very good. Our server was very friendly, she made sure we had everything we needed.

name: Ravenous Cafe
review description: The food was fabulous and the service was excellent! This is a restaurant where the patron is treated like royality. The place is small so I do recommend making reservations.

name: Red Lantern â€“ Thunder Valley Casino Resort
review description: Food was excellent as was the service!

name: Restaurant Thir13en
review description: Foodwise, it was a little hit or miss. The pasta was delicious, the melon soup was awful. The oysters were fresh, but several were in spawning stage. The chocolate dessert was delicious, but there was no summer fruit dessert (like cobbler, pie, etc.) and no sorbet in a place as hot as Sacramento. A little more attention to things like this would make this place outstanding and fit for foodies.

name: Rudy's Hideaway
review description: Staff are extremely courteous,helpful and timely. Seafood was as great as usual.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Fresno
address: 7844 N. Blackstone Avenue Suite 500 Fresno, CA  93720
review description: Food was fantastic. The service was really slow. An hour and a half to get our salads. The waiter was really nice and knew his food, but the wait to get out of there was about 3 hours.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Roseville
address: 1185 Galleria Blvd., Suite P-120 Westfield Galleria at Roseville Roseville, CA  95678
review description: Went for my 70th bday and quite impressed with service from server Justin and all other servers. Steak was just too greasy (ribeye) for my taste.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - Sacramento
review description: My favorite restaurant. What else can I say?

name: Sapporo Grill
review description: Came to the front desk. Was treated in a very aloof fashion until we told them we had a reservation and were early. Seating was horrible! They must be expecting clietele over 6' tall. My wife and I are 5'8" and 5' 4" and the table wss ridiculously high. The restaurant was basically empty. We looked over the menu, didn't like the food offering, it seemed to cater more to the sushi roll crowd than a japanese steakhouse. Waited for the server for about 10minutes in the empty restaurant. Server/Waiter/Waitress didn't show, started to feel uncomfortable, got up and left. My wife and I typically like quiet places. Rated the food good in order to submit the review, but we never ate.

name: Scott's Seafood Grill & Bar - Folsom
review description: We took our son for his birthday dinner. The service was good. Our water glasses where filled as needed. The food was good and well prepared. The noise level was low and we were able to have a pleasant visit. I ordered wine and the steam of the glass was very sticky. After bringing it to the attention of the waiter, I was promptly brought another glass, but with less wine then the original.

name: Scott's Seafood on the River
review description: Service was rushed. For a seafood restaurant, not mant fish choices.

name: Seasons - Davis
review description: This is our special occasion place in Davis. The food is always excellent, very creative and tasty. This particular visit we had a bad waiter, inattentive and somewhat rude. As an example, ribs were the special this evening. We were seated at 7:15 and told they were out of them. When I was disappointed about that, his response was, "should have gotten here earlier."--and not in a joking manner. He basically was invisible all evening and, upon us asking, another waitgotham to get our bread. The host/manager(?) was great and picked up the slack too. Needless to say, the tip reflected his lousy service. Luckily the food here is so good!

name: Sheepherder Bar & Grille
review description: The scallops wrapped in salmon and the flat iron steak were both very good. However, the halibut was dry and overcooked big time. The chef needs to work on that entree. We have eaten here many times, and we always enjoy the clam chowder and warm sourdough bread with garlic butter. Our waiter, Ralph, was very efficient and personable. He was also waiting on a table of about 10 people, but he took very good care of our party of 4. We will return, but will not order the halibut.

name: Sienna
address: 3909 Park Drive El Dorado Hills, CA  95762
review description: I thought our server cody was excellent. He had a trainee with him and it was the Trainee that surprised me with a Scallop dish....excellent choice. I let them surprise me with my meal.

name: Skewers Kabob House
review description: A team of seven went and the food was perfect. We arrived early and was seated.

name: Spataro Restaurant and Bar
review description: Excelent food and service. Only downfall is you almost always need to use the valet parking 7 bucks plus tip due to lack of street parking.

name: Sudwerk
review description: Food was delicious and definitely worth going back for. Very large menu with plenty of options for every palate. The beers were also very good. My family enjoyed the BBQ tri tip sandwiches, the schnitzel and a burger. Even the french fries were tasty! And the fresh fruit that was a side with the tri tip sandwiches was also very good-and fresh! My only suggestion is to have a more extensive kids menu as there were only three items on it.

name: Suede Blue
review description: Outstanding food and service. Charming wait staff. Very attractive property. Party of 5 (originally planned 6) was seated at an OVERSIZED table for 8....cold and certainly not conducive for conversation

name: Taste Restaurant - Plymouth
review description: the food is excellent. there is always a seasonal surprise.

name: Ten22
review description: Came from out of town & made reservation early in the week. Not happy with table given, and so we accommodated with patio table. But it was in the brick corner & HOT. Moved ourselves over, and it was way cooler. Our server Shawn was wonderful. Will be back!

name: Tequila Museo Mayahuel
review description: If you plan on talking to your friends on a weekend evening make other plans because the accoustics are terrible.The food is amazing and the tequila and Margaritas are the best in Sacramento.

name: Toscana's Ristorante - Turlock
review description: Service and food were outstanding. The menu offers a nice selection of dishes which will make this a restaurant to visit often.

name: Tower Bridge Bistro
address: ES Sacramento 100 Capitol Mall Sacramento, CA  95814
review description: I ordered the Miso glazed salmon. By connotations one would consider that the chef would be using a traditional glaze with a miso base, however when I received my dinner all the chef had done was take a giant wad of miso paste, smear it on the salmon, and then torn it a little bit. It made me feel as the the chef had no idea what he was doing, all you could taste was the overpowering miso - which unless you're a miso conosieur, is not a good flavor in overly large quantities. Luckily, my dish was salvageable by scraping off all of the miso paste and the broth he had made for the soba noodles was quite good. My date had the roasted chicken, which even though was a little over, was far better than my entree.

name: V Restaurant
review description: Outstanding experience for a special occasion trip to the small town of Murphys. Food was absolutely outstanding, service good, pleasant, helpful. Wine list good. Wines very good in a wine country setting. Very nice setting, indoors and out. Will return.

name: Verona Cucina Italiana
address: 1700 McHenry Ave. Suite I-46 Modesto, CA  95350
review description: Wonderful food and service considering how late we were. As always, the fish was fresh and amazing.

name: Vines - Hyatt Regency Sacramento
review description: Good food at a reasonable price for the lunch buffet. We've eaten here before and there was one change we didn't like. Bread rolls used to be available on the buffet table and are no longer offered. Now you must ask the server to bring bread which is a focaccia style and not the rolls previously offered.

name: Waterboy
review description: Really enjoyed my experience at Waterboy. The food was excellence and the service was wonderful. I think the items were very well price considering the quality of the food and customer service the entire restaurant provides. I added a note to my Open Table reservation, and just like I requested we were seated at a more intimate table. Iâ€™m definitely going back!

name: Wine & Roses
review description: This was my second visit over the past two months. Ate inside this time as the temperature outside was just too hot. We had a fantastic Saturday lunch/brunch. Our first two wine selections were not available, but the third one was perfect, which made up for not having the first two. Lunch was fantastic. We each ordered something different and we all shared bites from one another. We only had two desserts, the chocolate chocolate cake and the tiramisu. Both were heavenly. Everything about the place is fantastic. The food presentation is top notch.

name: Woodbridge Crossing
review description: All four of us ordered red meat at varying doneness. It was done to perfection. The medium rare, rare, and medium well was perfect.

name: Yosemite Ranch Steak House
review description: Ive been 3 times. My on as visiting from Oregon so we took him there for dinner. The only thing i need to say thats not in Positive light. Is All 3 times i have ordered a Steak Very very well done aske for No pink! All 3 times ive had to send my steak back to be corrected to my liking. It frustrating when Everynes eating and Im sitting there. Other than that Foods Always been well and Servers are great! Just wish that would stop happening with my food.

name: Zinfandel Grille - Sacramento
review description: Zinfandel Grille had fantastic food and a wonderful patio. I think the server may have been a tad too busy, I had to ask the busser for my wine I requested with dinner and it took an exceptionally long time to get our check.

name: Zocalo Restaurant
review description: This was my second time dining at this restaurant and it was even better than the first. Great food!
